channel.title: Does anyone know much money you need for sponserd?
channel.description:
Sup guys, I am thinking of buying sponserd next month and I know the bidding starts at 30$ but that it always end up way higher.
But how much is the avarge the last place has to pay up? I am sure there isnt a big difference every month.
Also does anyone have any experience with this for their server? Is it a good investment?
Peace ;)

item.title: Does anyone know much money you need for sponserd?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It’s all relative, there isn’t a fixed amount for last spot or any spot. It can fluctuate, or follow a similar pattern each month. All the required information is included within the sticky topics and if you have any more questions/concerns go ahead and message me. On the note of what’s worth buying, I would suggest you judge that yourself by looking into it properly rather than relying on members opinions which are usually formed out of guessing.

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know much money you need for sponserd?

item.title: Does anyone know much money you need for sponserd?
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:521222”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=639733.msg4311965#msg4311965 date=1370887496]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=639733.msg4311932#msg4311932 date=1370885289]

[quote author=youridudock link=topic=639733.msg4311909#msg4311909 date=1370883486]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=639733.msg4311883#msg4311883 date=1370881002]

Mhh aight sounds alright, does anyone have a awnser for my second question?
[/quote]mopar is by far the largest advert place in all of the communities for gold spot versus traffic. R-S has nothing on the traffic you get from here.

True that, but I heard you can buy a add on RL for 250$
I think I go with Moparscape, always been my favorite Rsps site haha
[/quote]I didn’t know RL offered spots :o
[/quote]Yeah, they are now on their toplist.
http://www.runelotus.com/ads.html
[/quote]in that case…you would probably be better off using RL

I would say traffic wise it goes

RL>Mopar>R-S[/quote]

It’s ridiculous what they do… they put advertisement of other servers in your server page
Also addblocker blocks there adds so alot of people wont see it, probably still more then mopar.

RiiPiiNFtW:

Server I am apart of paid $350 for it this month.

350$ for the last spot or…?

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know much money you need for sponserd?
